movie.title: X-Men
movie.abstract: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.

movie.title: Alien
movie.abstract: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.

movie.title: Titanic
movie.abstract: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind, but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movie.title: Kung Fu Hustle
movie.abstract: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious Axe Gang while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

movie.title: Shaolin Soccer
movie.abstract: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.abstract: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie.title: Laputa: Castle in the Sky
movie.abstract: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

movie.title: The Lion King
movie.abstract: Tricked into thinking that he caused the death of his father, a lion cub flees and abandons his destiny as the future king.

movie.title: Transformers
movie.abstract: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movie.abstract: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
